list.title: HTML5
list.description: The HTML training makes you proficient at creating semantic markup.

list.title: CSS3 and SASS
list.description: Get a solid foundation in CSS and knowledge of CSS3's possibilities.

list.title: JavaScript
list.description: The de-facto language to add interactivity to your web pages.

list.title: SQL
list.description: Learn to model, store and query your website's data

list.title: APIs
list.description: Learn about 3rd-party APIs to add features to your site.

list.title: NodeJS
list.description: Learn a popular back-end language to create data-driven websites.

list.title: Foundation
list.description: Learn Foundation, a responsive rapid-prototyping web framework.

list.title: jQuery
list.description: Learn how to create dynamic features for your websites.

list.title: React
list.description: Learn a popular UI framework to create single-page applications.

list.title: Git and GitHub
list.description: Learn how to manage file versions, and code collaboratively with your team.

list.title: Terminal
list.description: Learn how to do daily tasks using your computer's command line.

list.title: Grunt
list.description: Learn how to create automated workflows and speed up your web development.
